languages.text: "Все на Фенрисе имеет силу. Я бился в сотне битв, я получил сотню ран. Даже среди Волков не каждый пережил бы эти увечья. Я же всегда выживал. И с каждой новой победой мысли мои все темнее — что, если мне так и не доведется пасть с честью однажды? Что, если смерть моя будет глупой и бесславной? И Расс брезгливо отвернется от меня, когда я буду стыдливо обивать порог его чертога?"

"Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"
languages.original_text: "Все на Фенрисе имеет силу. Я бился в сотне битв, я получил сотню ран. Даже среди Волков не каждый пережил бы эти увечья. Я же всегда выживал. И с каждой новой победой мысли мои все темнее — что, если мне так и не доведется пасть с честью однажды? Что, если смерть моя будет глупой и бесславной? И Расс брезгливо отвернется от меня, когда я буду стыдливо обивать порог его чертога?"

traits.locale_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious? What if Russ turns away from me in disgust when I come scrounging at the door to his hall?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious? What if Russ turns away from me in disgust when I come scrounging at the door to his hall?"

But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious? What if Russ turns away from me in disgust when I come scrounging at the door to his hall?"

traits.locale_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “芬里斯的一切都具有力量。我参加了一百场战斗，受了一百次伤。就算是野狼，也并非总能从如此严重的伤势中恢复过来，但我总是能存活下来。每当我赢得了一场新的胜利，我的想法都会变得更加阴暗一分——如果我注定无法在荣耀中赴死，该怎么办？如果我的死亡愚不可及，毫不光彩，该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

traits.locale_text: “芬里斯的一切都具有力量。我参加了一百场战斗，受了一百次伤。就算是野狼，也并非总能从如此严重的伤势中恢复过来，但我总是能存活下来。每当我赢得了一场新的胜利，我的想法都会变得更加阴暗一分——如果我注定无法在荣耀中赴死，该怎么办？如果我的死亡愚不可及，毫不光彩，该怎么办？如果我来到了鲁斯的殿堂，他却厌恶地转过身，不允许我加入他们的盛宴，该怎么办？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Todo en Fenris tiene poder. He luchado en cien batallas y sufrido cien heridas. Ni siquiera los Lobos tenemos garantizado el sobrevivir a semejante mutilación. Pero siempre he sobrevivido. Y cada victoria lleva mis pensamientos por derroteros oscuros: ¿y si estoy condenado a no morir con honor? ¿Y si muero de forma insensata y carente de gloria?».
languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

traits.locale_text: «Todo en Fenris tiene poder. He luchado en cien batallas y sufrido cien heridas. Ni siquiera los Lobos tenemos garantizado el sobrevivir a semejante mutilación. Pero siempre he sobrevivido. Y cada victoria lleva mis pensamientos por derroteros oscuros: ¿y si estoy condenado a no morir con honor? ¿Y si muero de forma insensata y carente de gloria? ¿Y si Russ me da la espalda, repugnado, cuando acuda a las puertas de su salón?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「フェンリスのものにはすべて力がある。俺は百の戦いを切り抜け、百の傷を負った。狼でさえ、そのような重傷を負って生き残れるかどうかはわからない。しかし、俺は常に生き残った。そして新たな勝利のたびに、俺の思考は暗い方向へと向かっていった…もし本当に、名誉ある死を遂げることができない運命にあるのだとしたら？もし俺の死が愚かで不名誉なものだったら？」
languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

traits.locale_text: 「フェンリスのものにはすべて力がある。俺は百の戦いを切り抜け、百の傷を負った。狼でさえ、そのような重傷を負って生き残れるかどうかはわからない。しかし、俺は常に生き残った。そして新たな勝利のたびに、俺の思考は暗い方向へと向かっていった…もし本当に、名誉ある死を遂げることができない運命にあるのだとしたら？もし俺の死が愚かで不名誉なものだったら？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Alles auf Fenris hat Macht. Ich habe in einhundert Schlachten gekämpft und wurde einhundert Mal verwundet. Selbst Wolves überleben solch schwere Wunden oft nicht. Doch ich habe immer überlebt. Und mit jedem neuen Sieg wurden meine Gedanken düsterer – was, wenn ich wirklich dazu bestimmt bin, nie ehrenvoll zu sterben? Was, wenn mein Tod töricht und ruhmlos ist?"
languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

traits.locale_text: "Alles auf Fenris hat Macht. Ich habe in einhundert Schlachten gekämpft und wurde einhundert Mal verwundet. Selbst Wolves überleben solch schwere Wunden oft nicht. Doch ich habe immer überlebt. Und mit jedem neuen Sieg wurden meine Gedanken düsterer — was, wenn ich wirklich dazu bestimmt bin, nie ehrenvoll zu sterben? Was, wenn mein Tod töricht und ruhmlos ist? Was, wenn Russ sich angewidert von mir abwendet, wenn ich an der Tür zu seiner Halle betteln komme?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Sur Fenris, tout a du pouvoir. J'ai connu cent batailles et souffert cent blessures. Même les Space Wolves ne sont pas sûrs de résister à de si graves mutilations. Mais j'ai toujours survécu. Et avec chaque nouvelle victoire, mes pensées ont pris un tour plus sombre. Et si j'étais vraiment destiné à ne pas connaître de mort honorable ? Et si ma mort était dénuée de sens et honteuse ? »
languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

traits.locale_text: « Sur Fenris, tout a du pouvoir. J'ai connu cent batailles et souffert cent blessures. Même les Space Wolves ne sont pas sûrs de résister à de si graves mutilations. Mais j'ai toujours survécu. Et avec chaque nouvelle victoire, mes pensées ont pris un tour plus sombre. Et si j'étais vraiment destiné à ne pas connaître de mort honorable ? Et si ma mort était sotte et honteuse ? Et si Russ se détournait de moi avec dégoût lorsque je viendrais frapper à sa porte ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

languages.text: "Fenris'te her şeyin gücü vardır. Yüzlerce savaşta savaştım, yüzlerce yara aldım. Kurtlar bile öyle feci bir yaralanmadan sonra sağ kalamaz. Fakat ben kaldım. Her bir zaferimle birlikte düşüncelerim de giderek karardı. Ya gerçekten onurumla ölmek kaderimde yoksa? Ya ölümüm aptalca ve alçakça olursa?"
languages.original_text: "Everything on Fenris has power. I have fought in a hundred battles, and suffered a hundred injuries. Even Wolves are not certain to survive such grievous maiming. But I always survived. And with each new victory, my thoughts took a darker turn — what if I truly am destined never to die with honour? What if my death will be foolish and inglorious?"

traits.locale_text: "Fenris'te her şeyin gücü vardır. Yüzlerce savaşta savaştım ve yüzlerce yara aldım. Kurtlar bile öyle feci bir yaralanmadan sonra sağ kalamaz. Fakat ben kaldım. Her bir zaferimle birlikte düşüncelerim de karanlık bir hâl aldı. Ya gerçekten onurumla ölmek kaderimde yoksa? Ya ölümüm aptalca ve alçakça olursa?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
